meanings.definition: Having a stronger or more intense flavor or aroma, resembling that of thyme.
meanings.sent1: The soup was thymier than usual, with a rich scent of thyme.
meanings.sent2: The stew became thymier as the chef added more herbs for flavor.
meanings.sent3: The kitchen was filled with the thymier aroma of herbs, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent4: The thymier fragrance of the flowers in the garden attracted bees from afar.
meanings.sent5: The thymier taste of the dish lingered on my palate long after the meal.
